column1: A service for Vicki H. Lauckhardt will be held on Tuesday
column3: 2015 at 11 a.m. in the chapel of the McLane Lakewood Funeral Home with Reverend Isaac Salgado officiating. The family will receive friends on Monday from 2-4 p.m. and again from 7-9 p.m. at the McLane Lakewood Funeral Home. Mrs. Lauckhardt will be cremated following the services and the burial will take place at a later date and time in New York.
